title: Avalanche | 1
description:
Davos, Switzerland. It’s been five years since she took over Richland Health, and Eleonore is finally ready to announce the biggest deal of her tenure. Santino prepares to introduce himself as the newest member of the Richland dynasty. Every moment is planned perfectly. And everything is about to go wrong.
